name: Potion Crushers
description:
Local wizard couch competition - time is counting down, collect the most potions to win!  --but while you're in the lead you'll be haunted by terrible spectres! 

Player One:

WSAD to move
Shift to fire your wand

Player Two:

Arrows to move
Space to fire your wand

Made in Unity and MagicaVoxel and Photoshop and Reaper.

This game was made for TOJAM - FLIRTEEN WITH DANGER in 2018. Heck yes!
